AI Prompt

1. Simplify your code to as short as possible for efficient implementation, while maintaining step-by-step thought process readability
2. Each step listed in my instructions should at least be one line
3. Reuse pre-existing functions
4. Wait for further instructions
5. Use numpy for matrix computation, pandas for creating dataframe, scipy for statistics, matplotlib for graphing, scikit-learn for pre-processing and machine learning, pytorch for deep learning

Code Presentation

1. Please clean the code such that it is reader friendly. No line should exceed 200 characters
2. Remove error checking code
3. Type code like a university freshman
4. Avoid 3-layer nested loops
